animeTitle: Black Clover: Mahou Tei no Ken (Dub)
otherNames: ブラッククローバー 魔法帝の剣
synopsis: The beloved fantasy manga, "Black Clover," known for its magical battles and published in Shounen Jump, is soon to be transformed into a movie adaptation. Having been ranked number one in 87 countries and regions as an anime show, fans can look forward to reliving the protagonist's journey, full of obstacles and accomplishments, on the grand screen. Please be advised that further developments regarding this production may alter the current information.
